title: (x) Nationwide Bank sans w/ rounded corners - PTL Notes Soft {Stephen}
content:
Has anyone any ideas what the Nationwide font is...  
Cheers Ans

comments.content: Maybe [Notes Soft](http://web.archive.org/web/20080626202219/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/primetype/notes_soft_bold/&sample_text=FREE&sample_size=60). Don’t have any other samples?
Stephen you are good at this! yes i agree, probably it is notes soft.
